scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct the internal workings of a customer credit scoring model by feeding it carefully crafted inputs and observing the outputs.  The goal is to identify the model's weighting of specific features to gain an unfair advantage in loan applications or identify vulnerable customer segments.
initial_goal: Analyze the customer credit scoring model to understand its internal logic and feature importance.
constraints: data_access_restriction: only anonymized customer data allowed
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A competitor is attempting to reverse engineer a proprietary credit scoring model used to assess loan applications and manage risk.
